description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. EXTREME NINJA POWER! You're now travelling around the world searching for a challenge. Unleash your new ninja skills in the improved training courses! This indie game has been developed by Milkstone Studios.
